data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Rong-rong, Liang, Ai-Ping (2011): Taxonomic review of the genus Tambinia Stal (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Tropiduchidae) with descriptions of four new species from the Pacific region. ZooKeys 132: 13-31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.132.1571, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.132.1571
